title: Broke with a Plan: 5 Successful ways to Prevent your Pockets from Dictating your Progress
features: Have you ever had a vision, plan or dream that seemed BIGGER than what your POCKETS could afford? This is one of the key causes to many delayed dreams and visions. Many people often believe that money is the golden ticket to an accomplished goal. Yes, money is definitely a resource that is helpful toward moving in the direction of obtaining your goals. However, it is not the only driver that gets you there. This book helps you to RESET your thinking and understand the power of utilizing the resources you currently have to help you move past the mountain that yells, MONEY! People often allow current circumstances to detour them from their purpose and goals. Not anymore! It's time to see beyond where you currently are and MOVE FORWARD. Be ready to gain access to 5 essential ways to overcoming the stigma of allowing your pockets to dictate your progress.
description: Myra A. Harris is your everyday modern mom, wife, and educator by profession. As a purpose driven leader, she began the Girls of Essence organization in 2012. This G.O.E organization was created to inspire girls of various ages to thrive in their purpose and become leaders in their schools and communities. While empowering these girls, Myra was inspired to write her first book, Her Notes for Life, in 2014. Shortly after writing her book, she was selected as a 2014 honoree at the Girls and Guys Rock Louisiana Awards Show for her work with her G.O.E organization and as an inspirational author. While continuing her work and thriving as a motivational speaker, she has become an inspiration to many. In 2017 she launched Empower H.E.R Network, which was created to be a motivational resource for all women as they thrive in pursuing their purpose in life and business. Myra has continued to empower others through speaking and writing.
